fullplot: An intimate examination of a contemporary artist couple, whose living and working patterns are threatened by the imminent sale of their home.
plot: An intimate examination of a contemporary artist couple, whose living and working patterns are threatened by the imminent sale of their home.
title: Exhibition

tomatoes.consensus: Exhibition flouts convention with its untrained stars and impressionistic narrative; thankfully, writer-director Joanna Hogg ties it all together into an intimate, beautifully shot drama.
